entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle. Risk of freezing drizzle early this morning. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 20 January 2023
